thread.title: TV | Brothers

author: Brian Lloyd
title: TV | Brothers
text: Jim Sheridan directs Jake Gyllenhaal, Tobey Maguire and Natalie Portman in this drama about a solider's wife who begins a relationship with her brother-in-law. However, the relative peace is shattered when the husband returns home following a disturbing ordeal in Afghanistan. It's heavy, sure, but there are some powerful performances going on here.
